definition: a condition that is the inspiration for an activity or situation, make children
details:
noun
- a condition that is the inspiration for an activity or situation
= example: a condition that is the inspiration for an activity or situation
- a woman who has given birth to a child (also used as a term of address to your mother)
= example: a woman who has given birth to a child (also used as a term of address to your mother)
= synonyms: female parent
- a term of address for a mother superior
- a term of address for an elderly woman
- a stringy slimy substance consisting of yeast cells and bacteria
verb
- make children
= synonyms: get
- care for like a mother
= synonyms: fuss
